description:
On this Meeting Management Course, using videos and quizzes, your employees will learn…

Planning and Preparing

  • Creating the Agenda

Setting up the Meeting Space

  • The Basic Essentials
  • The Extra Touches
  • Choosing a Physical Arrangement

Meeting Roles and Responsibilities

  • The Chairperson
  • The Minute Taker
  • The Attendees

Chairing a Meeting

  • Getting Off on the Right Foot
  • The Role of the Agenda
  • Using a Parking Lot
  • Keeping the Meeting on Track
  • Dealing with Overtime
  • Holding Participants Accountable

Dealing with Disruptions

  • Off on a Tangent
  • Personality Conflict

Enrol on this meeting management course and discover how to manage meetings today.
title: Meeting Management Skills: Manage Meetings Better In One Day
